name: Alocasia Dragon scale
benefit: Decorative indoor plant; purifies air
watering: Keep soil moist but not soggy; water when top 2-3 cm is dry
Appearance: ilvery green leaves with dark green veining, textured like dragon scales.

name: Alocasia Hooded Dwarf
origins: Hybrid or cultivar, possibly from Southeast Asian species
benefit: Compact ornamental plant for small spaces.
watering: Water moderately, let topsoil dry before next watering.
Appearance: Smaller, hood-like leaves with dark green coloring and light veins.

name: Alocasia Mask
origins: Hybrid of tropical Southeast Asian species
benefit: Eye-catching foliage for home decor.
watering: Likes humidity and consistently moist soil.
Appearance: Dark green leaves with bold, white veins and wavy edges.

name: Alocasia Miri
benefit: Rare collector's item, used for exotic decor.
watering: Keep humid and moist; avoid dry air.
Appearance: Smooth, shield-shaped leaves with a glossy surface and defined veins.

name: Alocasia Pink Passion
benefit: Great for brightening rooms; aesthetic foliage.
watering: Keep soil moist but ensure good drainage.
Appearance: Vibrant pink or purplish stems with dark green leaves and striking veins.

name: Alocasia Polly Plant
benefit: Compact, great for tabletops or shelves.
watering: Water when the top inch of soil is dry
Appearance: Glossy, arrowhead-shaped leaves with white veins.

name: Alocasia Tiny Dancer
benefit: Quirky, whimsical look; ideal for indoor spaces.
watering: Moist but not soggy; likes humidity.
Appearance: Curved stems with upright, teardrop-shaped leaves.

name: Alocasia Zebrina
benefit: Stylish and modern look; great for plant styling.
watering: Let soil dry slightly between waterings.
Appearance: Striking zebra-striped stems with large, pointed leaves.

name: Bird of Paradise
benefit: Adds exotic, tropical vibe to interiors.
appearance: Large banana-like leaves and bright orange-blue flowers.

name: Dieffenbachia
benefit: Air purifying; very easy to grow.
appearance: Broad leaves with cream, yellow, or white variegation.

name: Majesty Palm
benefit: Air purifying and gives a tropical touch.
appearance: Feathery fronds and tall upright stems.

name: Money Tree
benefit: Symbol of good luck and wealth.
appearance: Braided trunk with shiny green leaves.

name: Monstera
benefit: Great for air purification and tropical look.
appearance: Large split leaves with glossy green surface.

name: Peace Lily
benefit: Cleans air of toxins like formaldehyde and benzene.
appearance: Dark green leaves with white hooded blooms.

name: Prayer Plant Beauty Kim
benefit: Folds its leaves at night; decorative pattern.
appearance: Colorful leaf veins, oval leaves.

name: Prayer Plant Public Goods
benefit: Good for meditation and calm spaces.
appearance: Green leaves with purple undersides and red markings.

name: Red Chinese Evergreen
benefit: Tolerates low light; very decorative.
appearance: Red and green variegated foliage.

name: Red Prayer Plant
benefit: Soothing colors and leaf movement.
appearance: Dark green leaves with red veins and patterns.

name: Snake Plant Kirkii
benefit: Low maintenance; filters air at night.
appearance: Thick, upright leaves with wavy edges and pale patterns.

name: Victorian Parlor Palm
benefit: Compact palm that thrives in low light.
appearance: Thin, elegant fronds growing in dense clusters.

name: Wintergreen Berries
benefit: Fruits have medicinal uses; nice fragrance.
appearance: Small green leaves and red berries.

name: ZZ Plant
benefit: Almost impossible to kill; ideal for beginners.
appearance: Glossy, dark green oval leaves on upright stems.

name: Boat Orchid
benefit: Popular for its vibrant flowers and elegance.
watering: Keep soil moist but not soggy.
appearance: Long leaves with boat-shaped, colorful blooms.

name: Dark Purple Orchid
benefit: Striking dark purple flowers for decoration.
appearance: Deep purple petals with exotic structure.

name: Sunset Orchid
benefit: Bright, sunset-colored flowers bring warmth indoors.
appearance: Petals with orange-yellow gradient shades.

name: The Sill Aglaonema Wishes
benefit: Air-purifying and resilient, adds color indoors.
appearance: Pink and green variegated leaves.

name: The Sill Red Anthurium
benefit: Known as the ‘flamingo flower’, adds tropical beauty.
appearance: Bright red spathes with glossy green leaves.

name: Baby Rubber Plant
benefit: Compact and easy to care for; great desk plant.
appearance: Thick, glossy green leaves with a bushy form.

name: Benjamina Ficus
benefit: Air-purifying and elegant, often used indoors.
appearance: Slender branches with small, oval leaves.

name: Bird's Nest Fern
benefit: Adds a tropical look; helps filter air.
appearance: Large, wavy green fronds radiating from a center.

name: Bromeliad
benefit: Unique colorful flowers; low maintenance.
watering: Water into central cup; refresh weekly.
appearance: Bright rosette of leaves with a central bloom.

name: Pothos N’joy
benefit: Excellent air purifier; easy to propagate.
appearance: Trailing vine with green and white variegated leaves.

name: Stem Lucky Bamboo
benefit: Symbol of luck and prosperity.
watering: Keep roots in water or soil consistently moist.
appearance: Green upright stalks with lance-shaped leaves.

name: Zebra Plant
benefit: Eye-catching foliage; adds exotic flair indoors.
watering: Keep soil moist but not soggy.
appearance: Dark green leaves with striking white veins.
